```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tswge)
```

# Maximum Likelihood Estimation


```{r}
x <- gen.arma.wge(n = 200,
                  phi = c(0.3, -0.7), 
                  theta = -0.4,
                  vara = 4,
                  sn = 27)
est.arma.wge(x,2,1)
```

```{r}
x <- gen.arma.wge(n = 200,
                  phi = c(0.3, -0.7), 
                  vara = 4,
                  sn = 27)
est.ar.wge(x,2,1, type = 'burg')
```
